languages.text: Почувствовав силу, многие иерархи церкви в Просторе привыкли считать себя не слугами Бога-Императора, но его наместниками, коим положены почтение и роскошь. Возможно, поэтому церковь святого Друза не призвала верующих ни в один очистительный поход против протектората фон Валанциус.

Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.
languages.original_text: Почувствовав силу, многие иерархи церкви в Просторе привыкли считать себя не слугами Бога-Императора, но его наместниками, коим положены почтение и роскошь. Возможно, поэтому церковь святого Друза не призвала верующих ни в один очистительный поход против протектората фон Валанциус.

traits.locale_text: Feeling the power, many hierarchs of the church in the Expanse took to seeing themselves not as servants to the God-Emperor but as rulers in his place, who are entitled to reverence and luxury. This might be the reason why Saint Drusus Church did not call the faithful into the purifying march against the von Valancius protectorate.

Feeling the power, many hierarchs of the church in the Expanse took to seeing themselves not as servants to the God-Emperor but as rulers in his place, who are entitled to reverence and luxury. This might be the reason why Saint Drusus Church did not call the faithful into the purifying march against the von Valancius protectorate.

Feeling their power, many church hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in his place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Church of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

Feeling their power, many church hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in his place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Church of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

languages.text: 科罗努斯扩区的许多教会领袖品尝到了权力的诱人滋味。他们不再视自己为神皇的仆人，而认为自己是代祂行于凡世的统治者，有权享受万民敬仰与侯服玉食。或许，正是由于这个原因，圣德鲁苏斯教派一次都没有发动信徒净化冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 科罗努斯扩区的许多教会领袖品尝到了权力的诱人滋味。他们不再视自己为神皇的仆人，而认为自己是代祂行于凡世的统治者，有权享受万民敬仰与侯服玉食。或许，正是由于这个原因，圣德鲁苏斯教派一次都没有发动信徒，净化冯·瓦兰修斯王朝。

languages.text: Viele Hierarchen des Ministorums in der Ausdehnung sahen sich angesichts ihrer Macht nicht als Diener des Gottimperators, sondern als Herrscher an seiner Statt. Als Herrscher, denen Ehrerbietung und Luxus gebührt. Das könnte der Grund sein, warum der Kult des Heiligen Drusus die Gläubigen nicht zu einem einzigen läuternden Kreuzzug gegen das Protektorat von Valancius aufrief.
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Viele kirchliche Hierarchen in der Ausdehnung sahen sich angesichts ihrer Macht nicht als Diener des Gottimperators, sondern als Herrscher an seiner Statt. Als Herrscher, denen Ehrerbietung und Luxus gebührt. Das könnte der Grund sein, warum die Kirche des Heiligen Drusus die Gläubigen nicht zu einem einzigen läuternden Kreuzzug gegen das Protektorat von Valancius aufrief.

languages.text: Conscients de leur puissance, de nombreux hiérarques du Ministorum établis dans les Étendues en virent à se considérer non plus comme des serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, mais comme ses remplaçants à part entière ayant droit au même luxe et à la même déférence. Cela explique sans doute pourquoi le Culte de Saint Drusus n'appela pas les fidèles à une croisade purificatrice contre le protectorat von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Convaincus de leur puissance, de nombreux hiérarques de l'église établis dans les Étendues en virent à se considérer non plus comme des serviteurs de l'Empereur-Dieu, mais comme ses remplaçants à part entière ayant droit au même luxe et à la même déférence. Cela explique sans doute pourquoi l'église de Saint Drusus n'appela pas les fidèles à une croisade purificatrice contre le protectorat von Valancius.

languages.text: Conscientes de su poder, muchos jerarcas del Ministorum de la Extensión dejaron de verse como sirvientes del Dios Emperador para empezar a considerarse gobernantes en su nombre, con derecho a adoración y riqueza. Tal vez ese fuera el motivo por el que el Culto de San Drusus no convocara a los fieles en una cruzada de purificación contra el protectorado von Valancius.
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Al sentir su poder, muchos jerarcas eclesiásticos de la Extensión dejaron de verse como sirvientes del Dios Emperador para empezar a considerarse gobernantes en su nombre, con derecho a adoración y riqueza. Tal vez ese fuera el motivo por el que la Iglesia de San Drusus no convocara a los fieles en una cruzada de purificación contra el protectorado von Valancius.

languages.text: 自分たちの権力を自覚したエクスパンスのミニストルム・ハイエラークの多くは、自分たちを神帝陛下の奉仕者ではなく管区の支配者であると認識し、畏敬と享楽を権利として享受していた。これが聖ドルスス教団がフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領を浄化するための聖戦に、信者を一度も招集しなかった一因だったのかもしれない。
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: 自分たちの権力を自覚したエクスパンスのミニストルム・ハイエラークの多くは、自分たちを神帝陛下の奉仕者ではなく管区の支配者であると認識し、畏敬と享楽を権利として享受していた。これが聖ドルスス教団がフォン・ヴァランシウスの保護領を浄化するための聖戦に、信者を一度も招集しなかった一因だったのかもしれない。

languages.text: Enginlik'teki Ministorum din adamlarının birçoğu, sahip oldukları gücün farkındaydı. Kendilerini Tanrı İmparator'un hizmetkârı olarak değil, O'nun yerine hüküm sürüp saygı görmeye ve lüks yaşamaya hakkı olan kimseler olarak görürdü. Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın inananları toplayıp von Valancius protektorasına karşı arındırıcı bir cihat başlatmamasının bununla ilgisi olabilir.
languages.original_text: Aware of their power, many Ministorum hierarchs in the Expanse saw themselves not as servants of the God-Emperor but as rulers in His place, entitled to reverence and luxury. This may be the reason why the Cult of Saint Drusus did not call the faithful to a single purifying crusade against the von Valancius protectorate.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'teki Ministorum din adamlarının birçoğu, sahip oldukları gücün farkındalardı ve kendilerini Tanrı İmparator'un birer hizmetkârı olarak değil de, O'nun yerine hüküm süren, saygı görmeye ve lüks yaşamaya hakkı olan kişiler olarak görürlerdi. Aziz Drusus Tarikatı'nın inananları toplayıp, von Valancius protektorasına karşı arındırıcı bir dinî savaş açmamış olmasının sebebi bu olabilir.
